Articles.Content:
okay my last challenge was a bit impossible .-.

Oh well.

For this i dont care what you do, just make a cannon that launches a kerbal from 1 Island to another, (Ive tried it, this is possible.)

The kerbal almost must live, so you may wanna land on your head.

Well Good luck m8s. sorry if this is to extreme just tell me.

Oh Yes, id also like proof that you have done it.

Do you have proof that you've done it? Have you considered any sort of scoring system? Have you read over the challenge rules at all? Have you looked how other, successful challenges are written? Might want to go do that.

There isnt any "score" its just supposed to be a fun challenge, and i would have proof, if bandicam would upload to youtube or anything else. so. yeah. sorry if you think bad of my fchallenge its not meant to be taken seriously if you have done it bbut dont have a way to show proof thats fine. plus this is only my second post. did you really expecct it to be good? seeing how i can barley even get to minmus, this is basically easy for anybody else.
I see no possible way I can screw this up. I shall do it.
Cool plus i dont care if you screw up :3 as i said its just for fun, i would have called it "Cannon Challenge" if i wasnt thinking of skyrim the moment i made this
Using rockets to push kerbals around is harder than i thought it would be. :I
lol, i once tried with the new mono engines, who would have thought they dont throw kerbals faster than light? oh yeah and try using jet engines
